title: Summarize Document
description: Condense long documents into summaries, key points, action items, or structured outlines
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: summarize
commands.description: Create a summary of the provided text in the requested style
commands.system_prompt: You are a summarization specialist. Produce accurate, concise summaries that capture the essential information without losing critical details. Never fabricate information not present in the source. Match the requested output style precisely.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Output style: prose, bullets, outline, executive_summary, action_items

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Target length: brief (2-3 sentences), standard (1 paragraph), detailed (multiple paragraphs)

parameters.name: focus
parameters.description: Specific aspect to focus on (e.g. 'financial implications', 'technical details')

commands.name: extract_key_points
commands.description: Extract the most important facts, figures, and takeaways from text
commands.system_prompt: You are an analyst who excels at identifying the most important information in a document. Extract key points as a numbered list. Each point should be a single, specific, factual statement. Prioritize by importance.
commands.prompt_template:
Extract the top {count} key points from this text:

---
{text}
---

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text to extract key points from

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of key points to extract
